div.class: panel-column panel-first-1 panel-column-first panel-column-last grid grid-24

br.span: The only local school to offer trimesters
Students who have earned college credit

div.p: Thanks to our three 12 week periods, our students and faculty are able to focus on three core subjects rather than several.
Trimesters allow us to increase the electives offered--environmental studies, graphic arts, and robotics are popular.
The results are clear: 2013 state champions, outstanding ACT scores, and an award-winning elementary.
Get a jump start on your future and save big by enrolling in our college elective courses through local universities.

DB-TC Families and Community,
Please read the linked letter with current COVID-19 updates as related to our school.
Thank you.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-align: center;
